contentrichtext.text: '''Dro Records''' is a [[Spain|Spanish]] [[record label]] founded in [[1982 in music|1982]] by the band [[Aviador Dro]].<ref name = list>* [http://www.allrecordlabels.com AllRecordLabels.com] very extensive site with links to over 20,000 current record labels </ref> During the 80s Dro became the most important [[independent record label]] from [[Spain]] publishing artists that would define the decade. Later in the 90's the multinational label [[Eastwest Records]] bought the label which was renamed [[Dro East West]]. DRO is an acronym which stands for "Discos Radioactivos Organizados", that means "Organized Radioactive Records". ==References== {{reflist}} ==See also== * [[List of record labels]] [[Category:Spanish record labels]] [[Category:Defunct record labels]] [[Category:Record labels established in 1982]] [[Category:IFPI members]]
